meanings.definition: A type of fish with a box-shaped body and hard, bony plates covering its skin.
meanings.sent1: The boxfishes swam gracefully in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of boxfishes while snorkeling in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The boxfishes decided to have a box-building competition underwater.
meanings.sent4: The boxfishes stood out in the sea like armored tanks.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the unique appearance of the boxfishes.
